thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 43 of 3060
thread.title: Spence Jackson

author: Spence Jackson
title: Spence Jackson
text: I suspect all the good reviews for this site are written by there own people. They take no responsibility for the rental car companies they refer the customer to, and I was given a car that was not even the size I had reserved, much less the actual car, yet I paid the amount Quote: d for the smaller car. Garbage is the best word for both this site, and Budget, the company who doesn't even honor their reservations.
